pages.text: Calling upon the freezing might of ice & frozen water, this ritual will rapidly turn the area around it into a glacier.$(br2)Snowmen will occasionally spawn, and those that do are regularly healed by the ritual's power. Farmland will be moisturised, water freezes into ice, and lava into obsidian.$(br2)$(standing_stones) $(l:rituals/ritual_frost_lands#multiblock)This ritual requires standing stones.$()
